info.title: Om Running Tempo
info.description: Running pace is the time it takes you to cover a specific unit of distance (kilometer or mile). It's an essential metric for runners looking to plan training sessions and set race goals.
info.tip: Tip: A consistent pace is key to success in long-distance races. Use this calculator to plan your race strategy and maintain a sustainable pace.
